term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - beam current in in situ microanalysis
term.title: beam current

item.text: The number of primary electrons reaching the surface of the specimen per unit time expressed as electrical current. Recommended symbol: iB; unit: A; typical range: nA. Recommended measurement technique: Faraday cage.

sources.item: PAC, 1983, 55, 2023. 'Nomenclature, symbols and units recommended for in situ microanalysis (Provisional)' on page 2026 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198355122023)
